hey pigs and boars! wanna hv breakfast before church tgt or nt? 930 at city hall w.o breakfast. 800 at city hall w breakfast. leave a comment eh.

hahas.. jolene.. you are the bimbo rmb? the BIGGG BIMBO w.o boobs nor brains! wahaaha. kidding lahs. dun take it too hard. PIGGGGGGS. missed you guys.. sunday's approachin. just CANT WAIT! omg. lols. is every PIGG going? hahas. CYA SOON~ esp this sunday i hope to see every PIGG. jolene et justin andy seann. hahas. btw we haven started on our piggiesfc portfolio. hee~

heh.
Met him just now @ cj and god damn it embarrassed me in public and dunno wad the hell u said abt me to jen!!!anywayz meetin ya guys tis sunday!!! yay!!!
eh...one week ago we saw each other? so u all going for the cj party? it starts at 11.probably ends in the morning - -.
hey, calling all the hunks n babes. u all going for the cj party arhx???

hi babes and hunks.. haven seen u guys are a long long time. well.. its just one week. but it seemed like forever lahs. hahas. so how are you guys? doing well? hope so. anyway.. i cant wait to meet u guys this sunday! going to church is a fantastic idea. wanted to go since a long time ago.. but always cant find the right peeps to go with. hahas. cj's party is fine with me.. but make sure its fun! hahas.. cya soon. continue to friggin rock the world, piggs. :)

blitzed out. finally i m funked out. TOTALLY. meetin on sunday remem all chiobus n hunks. at newcreatn. im juz frickin bored. supposed to do my minutes now. but wth? life aint all abt work...all work n no play makes me a dull ass. spastic blog entry. death to all!
we gonna rock the world wif laughter, crapping n fooling ard. long live piggiesfc. no 1 in the world rocks xcept us.

there's a cj party at chinablack, pac plaza this friday, 28th May. if u guys wanna join in. dun worry, it's for 16 and above. jst cant get booze tts all. bt et cant make it cus of her piano. and andy has ptc the nx day.

club meeting on 30th may this sundayy! we're going to newcreationchurch first. it's at suntec city.most probably 2nd svc 1115-1pm. after tt we'll hang out! MUST COME.i guarantee no regrets, heh. church is a good start for a day! after tt we'll be damn happy. so dump ur sorrows and come cus the hols are starting! p.s: u wont sleep doing sermon cus my pastor's sooper funny. we hvnt had a full meeting in ages, so pls try to make it ya? we'll hv a great time trust me. if u cant make it, u'd better hv a damn bloody gd reason prepared. or jolene will fart in ur face. and it'll be a great opportunity to take pics.heh. all of us try nt to brood abt the mids. :) see ya. if u cant make it, leave a comment or post smthg.

eh, pls talk more here aye! dun keeep quiet u idiots. those who want pics and videos (of the pig only) taken on the day of the mjc choir concert tell me. damn, we didnt take enough! (after tt we were all (mostly) frustrated rmb.)
shopping?! you want us to carry the bags for you right.PIG!
Wanna meet up aft the exams and shop...rather...MUST go shoppin ya guys! oh yea and watch spiderman 2...yipee!!

(Oten-gleeden-glotten-glowden) Give it to me baby, uh huh, uh huh! Give it to me baby, uh huh, uh huh! Give it to me baby, uh huh, uh huh! And all the girlies say I'm pretty fly for a white guy. Uno, dos, tres, quatro, cinco, cinco, seis. You know it's kind of hard just to get along today. Our subject isn't cool but he fakes it anyway. He may not have a clue, and he may not have style, But everything he lacks, well he makes up in denial. So don't debate,a player straight. You know he really doesn't get it anyway. Gotta play the field, and keep it real. For you no way, for you no way. So if you don't rate, just overcompensate, At least you'll know you can always go on Ricki Lake. The world needs wannabe's, So hey, hey do that brand new thing. Give it to me baby, uh huh, uh huh! Give it to me baby, uh huh, uh huh! Give it to me baby, uh huh, uh huh! And all the girlies say I'm pretty fly (for a white guy). He needs some cool tunes, not just any will suffice, But they didn't have Ice Cube so he bought Vanilla Ice. Now cruising in his Pinto he sees homies as he pass, But if he looks twice they're gonna kick his lily ass. So don't debate,a player straight. You know he really doesn't get it anyway. Gotta play the field, and keep it real. For you no way, for you no way. So if you don't rate, just overcompensate, At least you'll know you can always go on Ricki Lake. The world loves wannabes, So hey, hey do that brand new thing. Now he's getting a tattoo, yeah, he's gettin' ink done. He asked for a "13" but they drew a "31." Friends say he's trying too hard and he's not quite hip, But in his own mind, he's the, he's the dopest trip. Give it to me baby, uh huh, uh huh! Give it to me baby, uh huh, uh huh! Give it to me baby, uh huh, uh huh! uno, dos, tres, quatro, cinco, cinco, seis. So don't debate,a player straight. You know he really doesn't get it anyway. Gotta play the field, and keep it real. For you no way, for you no way. So if you don't rate, just overcompensate, At least you'll know you can always go on Ricki Lake. The world needs wannabes-a, The world loves wannabes-a. Let's get some more wannabes. And hey, hey do that brand new thing!
